abstract: A consortium of sovereign wealth funds and private equity firms is in negotiations with bankers, an official briefed on the talks said.
snippet: A consortium of sovereign wealth funds and private equity firms is in negotiations with bankers, an official briefed on the talks said.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America is completing plans to sell more than half of its stake in the China Construction Bank in a deal that could raise nearly $10 billion, just a day after Warren E. Buffett invested $5 billion in the beleaguered American financial giant.

headline.main: Big Asset Sale Near at Bank of America
headline.print_headline: Big Asset Sale Near At Bank of America
